column4: hey guys I have a /, /home and swap partitions on my hdd, and I want to upgrade to a newer OS and keep my /home and its files, but it's on a dual boot with windows 7, will it affect my MBR and cause problems?
no, just use custom partitioning and mark the current / for formatting, mark the /home partition to be used as /home but NOT to be formatted too
make sure you use the same username for your first user as you did in the current install and all will be ok
yes will do and thanks again
